column3: Latest;Kampot: Reports from Kampot province that on the morning of October 7
column5: there was an online gambling crackdown in Kampong Bay village
column8: Kampot police  detained 17 Chinese suspects and confiscated mobile phones and computers.------The report added that the property was owned by a 38-year-old Cambodia male who had been renting to the Chinese for almost seven months.------The suspects and evidence are now being sent to the Kampot Provincial Police Department to make a case for legal action.------ SWIFT NEWS
